name: Tea - Virtual Economy Simulation Platform and Game
description: Tea is a virtual economic simulation platform and a game that utilizes it. By providing a system similar to an actual economy, users can freely exchange currency and items, thereby simulating a monetary economy. Various social systems can be simulated.

video.name: Tea - Virtual Economy Simulation Platform and Game
